items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
20% increased Curse Duration
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have 19% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 29% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 18% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
explicitMods: Base duration is 8.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 29% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 18% less Action Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Queen of the Forest
explicitMods: 236% increased Evasion Rating
+68 to maximum Life
+7% to Fire Resistance
+27% to Cold Resistance
+12% to Lightning Resistance
25% reduced Movement Speed
1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-40 Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals
flavourText: Shedding away her regal past,
she forged a new destiny.
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man,
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature.
Seizing her one true wish,
she found peace at last.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Deals 344 to 516 Physical Damage
Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 39% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that you cast yourself. Cannot support triggered skills, Vaal skills, instant skills, channelling skills, skills with a reservation or which create minions, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.80 seconds
Base secondary duration is 0.20 seconds
30% more Melee Physical Damage
100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
Buff grants 50% increased Movement Speed
Buff grants Phasing
Buff grants 100% increased Stealth

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: 10% increased Attack Speed
Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
Maximum 3 Snares per Enemy
